thread.section_title: RC Willey Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RC Willey | rcwilley.com | 2 of 150
thread.title: Kathryn Ball
thread.title_full: RC Willey reviewed by Kathryn Ball

author: Kathryn Ball
title: Kathryn Ball
text:
I had to take 4 hours of vacation time off of work for my scheduled delivery on 3/6/17. My delivery was supposed to be 12:30-3:30. I was called at 3:00 and told it would be from 3:30-5:30. I was then called at 6:05 pm and told that my table had shattered and the delivery would have to be re-scheduled.
First of all, I had to take vacation time off from work, then I sat at home all day waiting for the delivery from 12:30-6:05. Then it was never delivered.
I can't take any more time off for the delivery. I work 7:00 to 4:00 Monday through Friday and cannot accommodate the delivery hours, especially when things like this happen.
